Rule.name: Must be dating before can break up and be enemies.

InfluenceRule.name: Impulsive people who are angry at other people are more likely to brutally break up
Cold people are more likely to brutally break up
Loyal people are less liekly to brutally break up
Loving people are less likely to brutally break up
Mean people are more likely to brutally break up
Domineering people are brutal
Hotheads are brutal
Forgiving people rarely break up brutally
Emotional and angry people break up brutally
Vengeful people are brutal
People are brutal with cheaters
People who feel superior are more likely to break up brutally
People break up brutally with cheaters
People break up brutally with cheaters
Bullies who think they are cooler than someone else are more likely to beak up with someone brutally
Arrogant people who are populat are more likely to break up brutally
People are brutal with people who have been consistently rude
people who are angry at other people are more likely to brutally break up
Insecure people are more likely to accept a brutal break up
Mopey people are willing to be brutally broken up with
Smooth talkers are more willing to talk themselves out of a brutal break up
Sex magnets can get it anywhere
Domineering people don't accept others advances to break up and shit
Arrogant people won't be broken up with by others
Self destructive people Love being brutally broken up with.
Stubborn people are unwilling to be broken up with
People are unwilling to be broken up with by people that they don't think are cool
Bullies are unwilling to be broken up with
People who are looking for trouble are more willing to get into a dramatic breakups
People won't get broken up with by people who are inferior
Arrogant people who feel like they are better than someone else in pretty much every way won't be brutally broken up with

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% fumbled a text and brutally broke %rp% heart
%list(i,r,and)% told %r% %prons(i,he/she)% %pron(i,was/were)% just using %pron(r,him/her)% but %rs% was all like 'I'm just using you too'
%i% called up 'the relationship police' to put out a restraining order on %r%
%i% tried to use 'the relationship police' to break up with %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)%n't having it
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% so into %pron(i,him/her)%self %prons(i,he/she)% didn't really notice %rp% feelings while breaking up with %pron(r,him/her)%
%r% agreed to stop invading %ip% icy moon which was hopefully some sort of metaphor for dating
%list(i,r,and)% broke up with each other without really listening
%i% tried to brutally break up with %r%, but %rs% thought %pron(i,he/she)% %pron(i,was/were)% joking
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% a total jerk breaking things off with %r%

Instantiation.name: BrutalBreakup - Cheated on I with O Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Huh? Oh! %r%... What are you.. doing here?
I can. Later!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey... %i%... Honey... I got your lovely text, but I think you may have mispelled my name. It isn't %o%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %shocked%! Yeah... About that... It was meant for %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So that part where you said I'm the only one forever and you love me like diamond blossoms?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, sorry. Not you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: .... I hope you rot in hell.

Instantiation.name: BrutalBreakup - R won't believe I's cheating Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So... I want to be completely... honest with you....
I really haven't ever liked you.... I love %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hahahahaha, you and %o%!? %gender(o,He,She)%'s totally out of your league!
Come back to %gender(r,Daddy,Mommy)% and I'll forget all about this.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, it's time you heard the truth.
You've only ever been candy to me. I don't really have any feelings for you at all.
I'll never feel for you what I feel for %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, get over yourself. I've just been using you, too.
Maybe now that we know where we stand, we can keep this going for a while longer, eh?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mmm... we'll see.
*Ring Ring*
*Ring Ring*
Hello?.. Oh, it's for you!
Yeah, they say it's the relationship police!
And they say that YOU are under ARREST!
Looks like you need to go to court.
I'm sorry %gender(r,sir,ma'am)% I've just been informed that the relationship police have issued a restraining order. Please step back 25 feet.
25 feet at all times.
*Ring Ring* Oh, it's for you.
Yeah, they say it's the relationship police!
They say you're under arrest!?!
Looks like YOU need to go to court.
%gender(r,Sir,Ma'am)%, I'm gonna need you to stop obstructing justice.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You are NOT breaking up with me with the relationship police. If you have something to say to me, say it to my face.

Instantiation.name: BrutalBreakup - Attention hog doesn't care how you feel

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I've been having some problems lately.
Problems with you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I've had some problems too, like...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm just sick of you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, to be honest, I've had my own...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And I really don't think this is working out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You know, sometimes I just feel like you're really harsh and critical and...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's great and all, but this is over anyway.
%sweetie%, I have something important to say.
See, you're like the empire.
You're like the galactic empire, and I'm like the rebel alliance.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm not really sure what to make of...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And like, you're totally invading my secret icy moon base. And I don't want it invaded.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want me to do...?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Stop invading my icy moon, %r%. Because next thing you know I'm going to have to be fighting a snow monster and sleeping inside the carcass of my tauntaun to stay warm. And that's just gross.
Do you understand?

Instantiation.name: BrutalBreakup - I and R are both attention hogs

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I''ve been having some problems lately.
Well, my thing is that-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Actually, can I get to mine first?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: My problem is that I'm-
Sick of you-
Like, you just bother me so much.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I feel like you're just so inconsiderate.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You seem to have these obsessions with yourself.
This is over.
You're fat.
And ugly.
I don't want to see you ever, ever again. We're through.
I hate you.
Seriously. Everything you do sickens me. You're gross.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Always such a kidder! You're too funny, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What part of this don't you get!? I'm breaking up with you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hahaha, stop it! You're making my sides hurt!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: .... Freak.
HOW DARE YOU!
Do you think I'm *blind*? Do you think I'm *stupid*?
%toc1%. DON'T THINK I MISSED THAT, you *%pejorative%*.
We are SO OVER!
Look, %r%. I think we should break up.
Yeah. It's not me, it's you.
You're just not that attractive to me any more.
Also, there's another %gender(o,man,woman)%. %o%. %gender(o,He,She)% is my everything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I... I think you should go now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, and before I forget: if you could return all those gifts I gave you as soon as possible, that'd be great.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'll return them to the DEPTHS of HELL! Which is where I'll be sending YOU soon, you soulless, despicable monster!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Actually, my locker would be more convenient.
